What is the purpose of revocation and recovery authorities in the context of VerusID?

Revocation and recovery authorities are additional VerusIDs that can be set up to manage your VerusID in case of exposure or compromise. A revocation authority can revoke access to a compromised VerusID, preventing unauthorized access to your assets. A recovery authority can then be used to recover the compromised VerusID and restore access to your assets. This adds an extra layer of security and control over your crypto assets.
